title: My website shows “Not Secure” in Firefox even though it’s using Cloudflare SSL
content:
Hi everyone,

I’m using Cloudflare SSL for my website https://snaptubeapkmody.com, but Firefox still marks it as “Not Secure” instead of showing the padlock icon. The site loads with HTTPS, and SSL seems active on Cloudflare’s end.

I’ve already enabled “Always Use HTTPS” and “Automatic HTTPS Rewrites,” and everything looks fine when I check my Cloudflare dashboard. I also tried clearing the browser cache and testing in private mode, but the warning still appears.

Could anyone guide me on what might be causing this issue or how to fix it in Firefox?

Thanks in advance!
creator: JudeBradshaw

title: Examen unidad 1
content: My name is Bibiana Granada. I was born and raised in Medellín and live there, which is why I love my city. I'm currently studying marketing to expand my knowledge and grow professionally. I graduated in Market Management Technology in August. In recent years, my life has changed a lot. I've achieved professional success and visited places I never imagined possible. My children and my husband have been instrumental in these changes. They've always been my greatest source of motivation and emotional support. Thanks to them, I've learned to balance my personal goals more effectively. Today, I feel more mature and confident in both my personal and professional life. I continue working every day to improve myself, seek new challenges, and make a positive impact on those around me.

title: Firefox freezes when saving files or changing default save location
content:
Mozilla Firefox freezes for 5 to 6 seconds when downloading / saving files or changing the default "Save to" location.

Other programs (i.e. MS Word, MS Excel, Chrome) don't suffer from the same issue.

  • I have mapped drives from my NAS on the same network.
  • "Automatic Destinations" folder has been cleared
  • Looking at the performance stats in Task Manager, CPU and memory usage values are normal.
  • Antivirus / firewall software disabled to no affect

Here is the profiler.firefox.com report: https://www.idrive.com/idrive/sh/sh?k=a2a6j1j3o3
creator: firefox3084
